name: Bouncy Ninja 2
description:
Bouncing Ninja 2 is even more dangerous than the original! Destroy the throwing stars and avoid the spikes as you scale a mysterious tower using your ninja powers. Collect treasure and complete missions along the way!

[HOW TO PLAY]
- Tap the screen to make the Ninja jump!
- Help the Ninja avoid the deadly spikes and strike the throwing stars!
- Stay alive for as long as possible!
- Complete all of the missions!

Have fun and compare your high score with your friends!
